00007 /**
00008  * check if an array of parameters matches certain criterias.
00009  * you can still use the (deprecated) defines of model.php (until i murder you)
00010  *
00011  * @package kata_utility
00012  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00013  */
00014 class ValidateUtility {
00015 
00016          private $rules = array (
00017                   'NOT_EMPTY', //text must be supplied or one option selected
00018                   'ALLOW_EMPTY', //text can be left empty or option unselected
00019                   'ALLOW_MULTI', //allow multiple option selections, user must select at least 1
00020                   'ALLOW_MULTI_EMPTY', //allow multiple option selections
00021                   'BOOL', //checkbox
00022                   'FLOAT', 
00023                   'INT', //integer
00024                   'NUMBER', //same as UINT
00025                   'YEAR', //4-digit year
00026                   'UINT', //unsigned int
00027                   'IP', //ip (v4 or v6)
00028                   'EMAIL', 
00029                   'URL',
00030                   //included here for backwards compability for deprecated model->validate()
00031          'VALID_NOT_EMPTY',
00032                   'VALID_NUMBER',
00033                   'VALID_EMAIL',
00034                   'VALID_YEAR',
00035                   'VALID_IP'
00036          );
00037 
00038          /**
00039           * checks the given values of the array match certain criterias
00040           *
00041           * <code>
00042           * check(array(
00043           * 'email'=>'INT'
00044           * ),$this->params['form'])
00045           * </code>
00046           *
00047           * @param array $how key/value pair. key is the name of the key inside the $what-array, value is a rule, the name of a function that is given the string (should return bool wether the string validates)
00048           * @param array $params the actual data as name=>value array (eg. $this->params['form'])
00049           * @return true if data validates OR $params-key, for example 'EMAIL' if no correct email given OR false if $params is empty
00050           */
00051          function check($how, $params) {
00052                   $result = $this->checkAll($how, $params);
00053 
00054                   if (!is_array($result))
00055                            return $result;
00056                   if (is_array($result) && (count($result) == 0))
00057                            return false;
00058                   return array_shift($result);
00059          }
00060 
00061          /**
00062           * checks the given values of the array match certain criterias
00063           *
00064           * <code>
00065           * check(array(
00066           * 'email'=>'INT'
00067           * ),$this->params['form'])
00068           * </code>
00069           *
00070           * @param array $how key/value pair. key is the name of the key inside the $what-array, value is a rule, the name of a function that is given the string (should return bool wether the string validates)
00071           * @param array $params the actual data as name=>value array (eg. $this->params['form'])
00072           * @return true if data validates OR $params-key, for example 'EMAIL' if no correct email given OR array() if $params is empty
00073           */
00074          function checkAll($how, $params) {
00075                   if (!is_array($how)) {
00076                            throw new InvalidArgumentException("validateutil: 'how' should be an array");
00077                   }
00078                   if (!is_array($params) || empty ($params)) {
00079                            return array ();
00080                   }
00081 
00082                   $errors = array ();
00083                   foreach ($how as $inpname => $howname) {
00084                            // be compatible with old validate
00085                            if (substr($howname, 0, 6) == 'VALID_') {
00086                                     $howname = substr($howname, 6);
00087                            }
00088 
00089                            $inpvalue = is($params[$inpname], '');
00090                            switch (strtoupper($howname)) {
00091                                     case 'NOT_EMPTY' :
00092                                              if (empty ($inpvalue))
00093                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00094                                              break;
00095                                     case 'ALLOW_EMPTY' :
00096                                              break;
00097                                     case 'ALLOW_MULTI' :
00098                                              if (!is_array($inpvalue) || (count($inpvalue) == 0))
00099                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00100                                              break;
00101                                     case 'ALLOW_MULTI_EMPTY':
00102                                              break;
00103                                     case 'BOOL' :
00104                                              if ($inpvalue != '1' && $inpvalue != '0')
00105                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00106                                              break;
00107                                     case 'FLOAT' :
00108                                              if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_FLOAT))
00109                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00110                                              break;
00111                                     case 'UINT' :
00112                                     case 'NUMBER' :
00113                                              if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_INT, array (
00114                                                                'options' => array (
00115                                                                         'min_range' => 0
00116                                                                )
00117                                                       )))
00118                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00119                                              break;
00120                                     case 'INT' :
00121                                              if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_INT))
00122                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00123                                              break;
00124                                     case 'HEX' :
00125                                              if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_INT || FILTER_FLAG_ALLOW_HEX))
00126                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00127                                              break;
00128                                     case 'EMAIL' :
00129                                              if (filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL) === false)
00130                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00131                                              break;
00132                                     case 'IP' :
00133                                              if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_IP))
00134                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00135                                              break;
00136                                     case 'URL' :
00137                                              if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL))
00138                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00139                                              break;
00140                                     case 'YEAR' :
00141                                              if (!is_numeric($inpvalue) || ($inpvalue < 1900) || ($inpvalue > 2099))
00142                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00143                                     case function_exists($howname) :
00144                                              if (!$howname ($inpname, $inpvalue))
00145                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00146                                              break;
00147                                     default :
00148                                              if (false === strpos($howname, '/')) {
00149                                                       throw new InvalidArgumentException("validateutil: '$howname' is no rule, function or regex. maybe a typo?");
00150                                              }
00151                                              if (!filter_var($inpvalue, FILTER_VALIDATE_REGEXP, array (
00152                                                                'validate_regexp' => $howname
00153                                                       )))
00154                                                       $errors[$inpname] = $howname;
00155                                              break;
00156                            } //switch
00157                   } //foreach
00158 
00159                   if (empty ($errors)) {
00160                            return true;
00161                   }
00162 
00163                   return $errors;
00164          }
00165 
00166          /**
00167           * check the given parameter-array against the rows of a model
00168           * 
00169           * @param string $modelname name of the model to validate against
00170           * @param array $params the actual data as name=>value array (eg. $this->params['form'])
00171           * @return true if data validates OR $params-key, for example 'EMAIL' if no correct email given OR array() if $params is empty
00172           */
00173          function checkAllWithModel($modelname, $params) {
00174                   $model = getModel($modelname);
00175                   $describe = $model->describe($model->getTableName(null, true, false));
00176                   $valArray = array ();
00177 
00178                   //remove primary key 
00179                   if (isset ($describe['identity'])) {
00180                            unset ($describe['cols'][$describe['identity']]);
00181                   }
00182 
00183                   foreach ($describe['cols'] as $colname => $coldata) {
00184                            switch ($coldata['type']) {
00185                                     case 'int' :
00186                                              $valArray[$colname] = 'INT';
00187                                              break;
00188                                     case 'string' :
00189                                     case 'text' :
00190                                              $valArray[$colname] = 'NOT_EMPTY';
00191                                              break;
00192                                     case 'bool' :
00193                                              $valArray[$colname] = 'BOOL';
00194                                              break;
00195                                     case 'float' :
00196                                              $valArray[$colname] = 'FLOAT';
00197                                              break;
00198                                     default :
00199                                              //TODO support more stuff
00200                                              throw new InvalidArgumentException("validateModel: no support (yet) for " . $coldata['type']);
00201                            }
00202                   }
00203 
00204                   return $this->checkAll($valArray, $params);
00205          }
00206
